description: Implemented lean output formats as default across 5 major tools: fast_search (grep-style), fast_refs (reference list), fast_goto (definition list), trace_call_path (ASCII tree), get_symbols (raw code). Each tool now returns its optimal human/AI readable format by default with 60-80% token savings. JSON/TOON still available via output_format param for compatibility. Fixed fast_search semantic fallback inconsistency. Created formatting.rs module for navigation tools with comprehensive tests (6 passing).
